page.title: 16THE BEACH, BOURNEMOUTH
page.content: OUR FAMILY HAVE A BEACH HUT AT SOUTHBOURNE BEACH. WE SHARE IT WITH OUR RELATIONS. I HAVE THREE COUSINS BUT ONLY ONE IS MY AGE AND HER NAME IS CLARE. CLARE AND I OFTEN GO AND BUILD SANDCASTLES AND MAZES. WE ALSO DIG BIG HOLES. WHEN WE GO IN THE SEA WE TAKE INFLATABLE TOYS. ONE OF THE TOYS IS A BIG TYRE. WE BOTH SIT OPPOSITE EACH OTHER AND WHEN A LARGE WAVE COMES WE BOTH FALL OFF. WE ALSO TAKE AN INFLATABLE BOAT IN AND WE TIP EACH OTHER OUT. SOMETIMES THE SEA IS WARM BUT IT IS NORMALLY COLD. SOMETIMES THE SAND IS CROWDED AND IT IS HARD TO FIND A PLACE TO PLAY.
